lead_paragraph: Southampton have vowed to work closely with the FA and Premier League after the club's assistant manager Eric Black was named in the newspaper investigation that has seen England manager Sam Allardyce and Barnsley assistant Tommy Wright lose their jobs.

headline.print_headline: Southampton Assistant Black Named in Newspaper Probe
headline.main: Southampton Assistant Black Named in Newspaper Probe
